text: I think, because it is a static sheet, there can be parallel stripes (really shadows) across the whole image. In this image it looks like the most obvious ones arise from the lower/left one on the right side of the instrument. But it looks like this image was capture using dual sided illumination (in this instrument that means separate images from illumination from one side or the other are fused and only the combined image is saved). You can check this by selectively using only the middle sheet via software, or manually blocking one or more.
